thread.title: Nuno A T Morais
thread.title_full: Chocolate Trading Company reviewed by Nuno A T Morais

author: Nuno A T Morais
title: Nuno A T Morais
text: Wonderful 100% dark chocolates, reasonably priced and the service is amazing, from the UK to Macau it only takes 4 days for delivery. Whenever I am running out of chocolates I simply get in touch with the Chocolate Trading Company.
